name: CHAOS RETURNAL
description:
Welcome to Chaos Returnal!

This game has been developed for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2 (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-6), which theme is "Let there be chaos!".

For better graphics, download the game and play!

Controls:

click shift to dash - utilize dash to quickly get out of enemies line of fire.

Use WASD or the Arrow key to move

click or hold left click to shoot

hold right click to use the shield - A shield costs magic while being used but will absorb any projectile that touches it. A projectile hitting the shield will give the player more magic.

Info

In Chaos Returnal, you will enter a lost temple to get rid of all the enemies. Don't wait! The faster you are, the more powerful you get! Increase your chaos level by beating up enemies as fast as possible, and grow your power. But be aware, as your chaos level increases, the enemies will get more aggressive. While being hit will reduce your chaos, it is also a good occasion to shoot them all faster, and get more powerful, to set a record time. Try to beat the three stages as fast as you can, and register your high scores. Try to improve your best times each time you play!

Thanks for playing! If you want to leave feedback in the comments, we really appreciate it. And, let us know how fast you have been :D
